title: Viki
description: Viki, a prominent streaming entertainment service, is characterized by its vibrant color palette. The blue shade (#3C9CD7) symbolizes trust and reliability, evoking a sense of calmness and open communication, while the pink hue (#D24663) adds a touch of creativity and vibrancy, representing a dynamic and engaging user experience. These colors are well-documented from the brand's official website and digital presence.
